text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: They're cheap! They're cheap! Freshly picked carrots, for a bargain price!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And if you act now, as an added bonus you can become a member of Team <Sirius>! If you don't hurry, they'll be sold out!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Will this really bring in new members……?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I get the feeling they'd join even if we didn't do anything……

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But this is where we need to be assertive! Otherwise the other teams will take all the talented girls!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Come on, Brian, if you keep making such a scary face, nobody's gonna stop by, you know?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: This is my normal face though.
With the coming of Spring, many Uma Musume wearing brand new uniforms passed through the academy's gates―
These girls that had just barely started out, with all their aspirations and anxieties, all had various expressions on their faces.
But it was clear in their eyes, they were focused on their dreams.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! I've finished putting up the posters!

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: We've properly put up ours too!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: At the gate～, at the dorm's cafeteria～, and even some of the classrooms.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
text_block_list.text: With this hopefully some more girls that want to join Team <Sirius> will show up!
It's not like we're lacking members, so there's no need to be so assertive while recruiting though……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But but, didn't we all decide to do this!? That we'd help spread the feelings that Team <Sirius> has built on!
……By the way, why are you wearing your Racing Uniform, Spe?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh? On the other hand, I was wondering why everyone is only wearing their school uniform. Yesterday, Gold Ship-san said we would be wearing our Racing Uniforms―

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well of course, if they see "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" running around it'll be great for getting attention, don't you think?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I-I see……?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Alright Spe! As head of Team <Sirius>'s publicity wing, show 'em how you run……show 'em your gallantry!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hehee, as I thought, she looks her best when she's running.
……that's right.
……that's right.
Uma Musume chasing down their dreams―
For those girls, the ones that support them are the trainers and their teammates.
And then, those girls who have taken hold of their dreams, carry on those feelings on to the next dream

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Everyone～! Let's work up the sweat of youth together～!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And then together with us, we'll fulfill your dream……!
